text: Alin Ștefan Vigariu (born 18 September 1980) is a Romanian footballer who plays as a midfielder for IFK Mora.http://fotbolltransfers.com/site/news/48708 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:FC U Craiova 1948 players Category:AFC Rocar București players Category:IK Brage players Category:FC Gloria Buzău players Category:CS Turnu Severin players Category:ACS Sticla Arieșul Turda players Category:Dalkurd FF players Category:Romanian expatriate footballers Category:Romanian expatriate sportspeople in Sweden Category:Expatriate footballers in Sweden
title: Alin Vigariu
